name: Avoid using Digraphs (C++)
description: The rule will raise a violation if digraphs' use is detected.
rationale:
The digraphs are: <%, %>, <:, :>, %:, %:%:.
The use of digraphs may not meet developer expectations.
reference:
AUTOSAR C++, 2014, Rule A2-6-1: Digraphs shall not be used.

MISRA C++, 2008, Rule 2–5–1: Digraphs should not be used.
remediation: Ensure you do not use digraphs
